techmeme.title: The US Commerce Department says subsidiaries of entity list companies would also be subject to trade restrictions, threatening Chinese companies, from Tuesday (Amrith Ramkumar/Wall Street Journal)
Researchers: Tile tags broadcast unencrypted MAC addresses and unique IDs; researchers informed Life360 in November 2024 but it stopped replying in February (Kim Zetter/Wired)
Google rolls out its new gradient "G" icon company-wide, saying it "now represents all of Google ... and visually reflects our evolution in the AI era" (Abner Li/9to5Google)
New York-based Modal Labs, which offers a serverless cloud platform to build AI apps and run AI inference, raised $87M led by Lux Capital at a $1.1B valuation (Chris Metinko/Axios)
Microsoft launches Agent Mode in Excel and Word, using GPT-5 to generate complex spreadsheets and documents, saying it is "bringing vibe working" to 365 Copilot (Tom Warren/The Verge)
